Module test_ui1
Package test_ui.Components

Class PlayerPaneController

java.lang.Object
test_ui.Components.Component.Component
test_ui.Components.PlayerPaneController
public class PlayerPaneController extends Component
Class PlayerPaneController shows the information about a layer such as its icon, name, current role, and allows to choose it. It extends class Component
